title: StructType Entity Schema
description: StructType entity definition - extracted from game-state.json for context window optimization. See schemas/formats.json for format specifications.

id.description: Struct type identifier (integer as string, e.g., '1', '2', '3'). Note: StructType IDs use regular integers, not 'type-index' format.

class.description: Struct class identifier (e.g., 'Command Ship', 'Miner', 'Reactor'). Used for cosmetic mod linking.

buildLimit.description: Maximum number of this struct type that can be built (string representation of integer)

buildDifficulty.description: Proof-of-work difficulty for building (string representation of integer)

buildDraw.description: Power draw during building (string representation of integer, in milliwatts)

maxHealth.description: Maximum health points (string representation of integer)

passiveDraw.description: Power draw when active (string representation of integer, in milliwatts)

possibleAmbit.description: Possible operating ambit (space/air/land/water) - bitmask (string representation of integer)

slotBound.description: Whether struct is bound to a slot (planet/fleet)

primaryWeaponCharge.description: Charge cost for primary weapon (string representation of integer)

primaryWeaponAmbits.description: Primary weapon operating ambits - bitmask (string representation of integer)

primaryWeaponTargets.description: Number of targets primary weapon can hit (string representation of integer)

primaryWeaponShots.description: Number of shots primary weapon can fire (string representation of integer)

primaryWeaponDamage.description: Primary weapon damage (string representation of integer)

primaryWeaponBlockable.description: Whether primary weapon damage can be blocked

primaryWeaponCounterable.description: Whether primary weapon can be countered

activateCharge.description: Charge cost to activate struct (string representation of integer)

buildCharge.description: Charge cost to build struct (string representation of integer)

oreMiningCharge.description: Charge cost for ore mining (string representation of integer, if applicable)

oreRefiningCharge.description: Charge cost for ore refining (string representation of integer, if applicable)

oreMiningDifficulty.description: Proof-of-work difficulty for ore mining (string representation of integer, if applicable)

oreRefiningDifficulty.description: Proof-of-work difficulty for ore refining (string representation of integer, if applicable)

generatingRate.description: Energy generation rate for generators (string representation of integer, if applicable)

stealthActivateCharge.description: Charge cost to activate stealth (string representation of integer, if applicable)

hasStealthSystem.description: Whether struct has stealth system capability

structs:databaseReference: structs.struct_type table (80+ columns covering all struct properties: build, weapons, defenses, economics, charges, etc.)
